title: Font for a resumate pleeeeeease :)
content:
Hi guys,

I would like to do a resumate like this one but i don't know what font to use. Is anyone able to tell me what font we got here for the title and the text please?

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415114738im_/http:/typophile.com/files/anders_5682.png)
author: grosmoche
